values: The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 1The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 1

When your life is over on this earth, there will be two paths you can take: you will either meet God in eternal wrath or eternal life.When your life is over on this earth, there will be two paths you can take: you will either meet God in eternal wrath or eternal life.
